title: Auth0 Deploy CLI
name: auth0-deploy-cli-extension
author: auth0
description: The Auth0 Deploy Extension allows you to use the Auth0 Deploy CLI to configure your Auth0 Tenant
uninstallConfirmMessage: Do you really want to uninstall this extension? Doing so will also remove the rule and the token endpoint.

auth0.scopes: read:tenant_settings update:tenant_settings create:client_grants read:client_grants update:client_grants delete:client_grants create:clients read:clients update:clients delete:clients read:connections update:connections create:resource_servers read:resource_servers update:resource_servers delete:resource_servers read:rules create:rules update:rules delete:rules
